welcome: Welcome to Mobizee – your gateway to hassle-free public transport!
Trip: Fuel the fun—book your family bus adventure today!
Trip1: More easy to Travel with family
Carbon: Contribute in Making India Carbon Neutral
Free_Cancel: Cancel bus tickets without paying cancellation charges. Quick refunds for cancellations or issues.
adjustable: Modify your travel date at least 8 hours before departure.
Earn_Rewards: Refer friends and earn ₹100 in your Bus wallet after their first trip.
Tracking: Track your bus in real-time & plan better.
Daily_Streaks: Earn Green Points every day you travel with us. Keep your streak going for bonus points and surprise rewards.
Ticket_Redemption: Use your Green Points to buy or discount e-tickets, making your travel more affordable.
Exclusive_Vouchers: Unlock exciting vouchers for food, shopping, and entertainment partners.
Milestone_Rewards: Hit milestones (e.g., 100, 250, 500 points) to earn special perks like priority boarding or free rides.
Eco_Bonus: Earn extra Green Points when you choose eco-friendly options.
Referral_Rewards: Invite friends to join and get bonus points when they start traveling.
Leaderboard: Climb the leaderboard and collect badges like Eco Warrior, Daily Rider, or Top Traveler.
Lucky_Draws: Every month, use your Green Points to enter raffles for bigger prizes (gadgets, travel passes, vouchers).
Green_Donations: Convert points into tree plantation or charity support, making your rides eco-friendly.
Select: Go the MobMogic Card section at the top of the Screen
online_ticket: You will get an Id , add it into the NFC of the phone
Ticket: Now you can use it with seamless connectivity
Check_in: Just tap at the bus gate and board the bus
